channel.title: CLASSPATH & PATH settings have been messed up
channel.description: Yeah could someone tell me the default ones please, or yours? i cant open a client up or anything. I have re-installed java countless ammount of times but it just doesnt work. Somone help please.

item.title: CLASSPATH & PATH settings have been messed up
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

Yes. Everyones path’s are different by the way.

For me. On Vista, my program files are

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin

Read full topic

item.title: CLASSPATH & PATH settings have been messed up
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

classpath:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_7\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Path:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_7\bin;

You’ll most likely need to change the JDK version.

Here is some more information on setting up Java: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,372873.0.html

Read full topic
